title: Routine Tracker
name: routinetracker
about: A simple web app for habit tracking.
description: Designed and create a full stack web app to allow users to track their habits
Leveraged Profiler to reduce redundant useEffect calls
Built and designed a RESTful API backend connecting to a PostgreSQL database

title: Oooh - Tap It
name: tapit
about: A creator-audience interactive tapping game for the social media platform 'Oooh'
description: Planned, presented and proposed game ideas and art directions to the module engine team
Created user flows, UI, user stories and broke down task lists for each screen of the designs
Implemented the loading, tutorial and gameplay screens as well as recording and video playback
Optimized performance through the pre-loading of assets to ensure smooth gameplay and processes

title: Genuity
name: genuity
about: A skills and events sharing app that connects local members of your community
description: Planned, developed, created user stories and prototyped the app on Figma
Created Firestore database and implemented user sign up/logins
Designed and created Android fragments and activities for different screens
Implemented the joining, removal and cancelling of user events

title: EcoBus
name: ecobus
about: A mobile-first app that tells users how much carbon emission they emit traveling around Vancouver
description: Planned, developed, created user stories and prototyped app ideas for initial phase
Added authentication and the reading and storing of app/user data using Firebase
Implemented the calculations of emissions data based on distance and average emissions of CO2 generated by a typical passenger vehicle
Created a test plan with positive and negative tests and implemented them using Selenium

title: Sector Six
name: sectorsix
about: A text-based dungeon game on a 25x25 board with character classes and monsters
description: Created a 25x25 board system with movement validation and difficulty progression
Designed four character classes with unique skills and stats
Implemented a turn-based combat system with varying enemies and bosses
Wrote 50+ unit tests and documentation/doctests for every function

title: Mobile Price Predictor
name: kaggle
about: Performed predictive modelling using a public data set on Kaggle
description: Identified the significant predictor variables using a chi-square test and ordinary least squares
Visualized data set variables with narration and summaries
Built Stochastic Gradient Descent, Decision Tree Classifier and Random Forest Classifier models to find the highest accuracy of the three
Achieved a final model accuracy of 89.6%
